model.game

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.game.Player

  • final class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a participant in a Chess game. Two instances of Player are owned by Game.
    Version:
    Mar 5, 2019
    Author:
    gemuelealudino, patricknogaj

      • Player

        Player(PieceType.Color color,
       Board boardRef)
        Parameterized constructor
        Parameters:
        color - the Color associated with a Player's PieceSet
        boardRef - the Board instance associated with a game

    • Method Detail

      • assignPieceSet

        private boolean assignPieceSet()
        Assign a PieceSet to this Player based on their PieceType.Color
        Returns:
        true if PieceSet is successfully assigned to this Player, false otherwise

      • playMove

        boolean playMove(Position piecePosition,
                 Position newPosition,
                 int promo)
        Player makes a request to play a move
        Parameters:
        piecePosition - the Position of a chosen Piece
        newPosition - the Position desired by the Player for a chosen Piece
        promo - integer that represents the piece to promote to (if != -1)
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • printPieceSet

        void printPieceSet()
        Prints the Player's pieceSet
